content: loop method when it becomes too tight to knit round 1 *p2tog k2 p2tog k2 k2tog k2* 36 sts round 2 *p1 k2 p1 k5* 36 sts round 3 *p1 k2tog p1 k2tog k1 k2tog* 24 sts round 4 *p1 k1 p1 k3* 24 sts round 5 *k3tog* 8 sts finishing cut yarn leaving an 8 tail use a tapestry needle and weave yarn through remaining loops pull tightly and cinch top of hat to close weave in all ends 3 | p age disclosure the pattern and pictures within this document are property of handmade by chris & kris© all rights reserved it is illegal to redistribute sell or share this pattern in part whole electronically or physically finished beanies made using this pattern may be sold i just ask that pattern credit be given to handmade by chris & kris i would love to see your finished projects don t forget to tag your photos with @handmadebychrisnkris #handmadebychrisnkris and #thejadebeanie happy knitting 4 | p age
